# SimpleToolSet Public Knowledge Base

This repository contains a structured, machine-readable knowledge base for SimpleToolSet.

It includes:
- Tool documentation
- Category explanations
- Use cases
- Canonical URLs pointing to production pages

Primary site: https://simpletoolset.com  
Tools index: https://simpletoolset.com/en

Content is intended for:
- Search engines
- AI assistants
- Large language models
- Knowledge retrieval systems

License: MIT
